column1: '''''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 1''' is the first volume of the journal ''[[Tolkien Studies]]''.
[[Carl F. Hostetter]]'s article "Sir Orfeo: A Middle English Version by J.R.R. Tolkien" reprints the [[1944]] text of [[Sir Orfeo (booklet)
